tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientGeneticData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  genetic_code TEXT,
  treatment_option VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_options VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE Genetic_Data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  dna_sequence TEXT,
  gene_expression TEXT,
  mutation_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_description TEXT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_Records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  medical_history TEXT,
  prescribed_medications TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
  genetic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  dna_sequence TEXT,
  mutation_status VARCHAR(20),
  testing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  medication VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  hospital VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientTreatmentHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_id INT REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id),
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
)
